currentdescription: Design, Construction, Supply, Testing and Commissioning of Piped Water Supply Schemes for habitations left out under “Har Ghar nal Ka Jal” nischay yojna in areas having ground water quality issues; with Electric Driven Pumps and Iron Removal Treatment Plant having Technology (Adsorption/ Ion exchange/ Membrane/ Nano Technology/ etc.) certified by CSIR or any other institute of national repute. In the District of Bhagalpur, Bihar on turn-key basis with 6 months Trial Run Period and Comprehensive Operation and Maintenance of 60 months under Mukhyamantri Grameen Peyjal Nishchay Yojna (Quality Affected)  under P. H. Dvision Bhagalpur East, Bhagalpur .  Panchayat Abhiya Pachgachhiya  Ward no 1A, 6A & Tintanga Karari 1A,  1B, 2A,  9A & 13A   Under Gopalpur Block.
